login-request: Please log in again as an administrator!
open-hours: The workshop does not have constant opening hours.
offer-type: There are no everyday offers, only intermittent.
take-away: Cakes can only be purchased for take away.
delivery-mode: Orders are delivered or can be picked up at the workshop.
order-steps-details: Add the products to the cart (in the specified quantity), then click on the 'Order' menu item above to continue. Pleasant selection!
slogan: SweetSpot - Landing strip on planet of Sweet Tooth
fill-properly: Please fill in the field correctly!
name: Name
come-back: We look forward to hearing from you soon.
management-infos: You have the option to change the data for an already uploaded product. Make sure the data is accurate and clear.
upload-infos: Enter a name for the product first, then upload an image that you will crop in a square. After successful upload, enter additional information and save the new product.
title-hun-placeholder: Enter the title of the product in HUNGARIAN...
title-ser-placeholder: Enter the title of the product in SERBIAN...
title-eng-placeholder: Enter the title of the product in ENGLISH...
description-hun-placeholder: Enter the description of the product in HUNGARIAN...
description-ser-placeholder: Enter the description of the product in SERBIAN...
description-eng-placeholder: Enter the description of the product in ENGLISH...
notes-placeholder: Description of decoration, color and other requests...
login-info: As an administrator, you can start managing items and orders.
error-login: Login failed. Check your details and your internet connection.
order-success-details: Thank you! Please check the order summary received in your email account.
error-order: A rendelés során hiba merült fel. Kérjük, próbálja újra vagy vegye fel a kapcsolatot velünk.
fetch-success-details: Previously placed orders have been loaded.
error-fetch: Failed to load previous orders. Try again.
picture-upload-success-details: You can continue to add the new product.
error-picture: Failed to save image. Please try again.
